description: Grameenphone IT is the technology arm of Grameenphone, the largest mobile phone operator in Bangladesh. The company provides a wide range of IT services, including software development, system integration, and network services
DataSoft is a leading software company in Bangladesh that provides a wide range of IT services, including software development, digital transformation, and AI solutions
LEADS is an IT consulting and software development company that provides a wide range of services, including IT consulting, custom software development, and mobile app development
